alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 16 at 4:51PM EST until December 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Ocean, along Barnegat Bay. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with some road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While the flow has switched to offshore, the water level remains very high on Barnegat Bay. This is resulting in areas of moderate flooding. The flooding should diminish later this evening as the winds continue offshore and the water is able to drain more.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
